participant_1.background:
I try new things to keep myself young.
I picked up my guitar and started playing.
i have a strange obsession with pens.
I always end up staring at my antique collection for hours.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.

participant_2.background:
I just cooked my family some spaghetti.
i dream of winning the lottery.
my husband was a salesman.
I love to watch my mother dance, so I put a ballerina mobile in my nursery to remind me of her.
I am a bit distant from my family, but I try to make time for them every weekend.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It is going well. I just cooked spaghetti for my family.
Oh that sounds tasty! I love spaghetti! I just started playing the guitar. What about you, do you play any instruments?
No I don't play any instruments. I would love to learn though.
You should! It is so much fun and a great way to de-stress.
I will look into it. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook, watch movies, and go for walks.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to cook and go for walks too. I don't watch a lot of movies.
Do you have a favorite type of food to cook?
I like to cook Italian food the most. It is my favorite.
That sounds delicious! I love Italian food too.
What is your favorite Italian dish?
My favorite Italian dish is spaghetti and meatballs.
Mine too! We should cook spaghetti together sometime.
That would be so much fun! I would love to.
